name: Battle Bumpers
description:
Battle Bumpers is a 3D multiplayer online third person driving action game set in the near future where people use bumper cars to battle each other on arena, trying to knock each other out.

This game was developed in around 4 months using the Unreal Engine, with the dedicated servers hosted on Azure.

How to create/join a game:
Just pick the same amount of players and the same map to join a game with your friends!

Key Bindings:
Drift - Right Mouse Click, L1
Boost - Left Mouse Click, Square
Items - Spacebar, Circle
Movement - WASD, Left Stick and R2 and L2
